page.heading: Contact us
page.content:
You can contact us in a few ways:
If you have questions or comments about , please subscribe to mailing list and post your questions there. For past messages circulated to the list, please see the archive.
If you've found a bug in , please file it in our bug tracking system.
If you need consultancy services in the area of document clustering, text mining and the Carrot2 framework, please contact the Carrot2 spin-off company.
